languages.text: "И омерзительнее всего то, что они извратили нашу веру! Они почитают Бога-Императора в облике ужасной четырехрукой твари, их проповеди полны ненависти к власть имущим и обещаний, что их жуткий "бог" однажды придет и уравняет их с их притеснителями... То есть с нами. На эту агитацию клюнули многие глупцы и смутьяны".

"And most despicable of all is that they have perverted our faith! They revere the God-Emperor in the form of a four-armed monstrosity. Their prayers are full of hatred toward those in power and promises of a reckoning when their dreadful 'deity' will come and equate them with their oppressors... With us, that is. Many fools and troublemakers have fallen for their lies."
languages.original_text: "И омерзительнее всего то, что они извратили нашу веру! Они почитают Бога-Императора в облике ужасной четырехрукой твари, их проповеди полны ненависти к власть имущим и обещаний, что их жуткий "бог" однажды придет и уравняет их с их притеснителями... То есть с нами. На эту агитацию клюнули многие глупцы и смутьяны".

traits.locale_text: "And the most despicable of all is that they have corrupted our beliefs as well! They revere the God-Emperor in the image of a four-armed abomination, their prayers are full of hatred toward those in power, and the promises that their dreadful 'deity' will one day come and equate them with their oppressors... With us, that is. Many fools and troublemakers have fallen for the campaign."

"And the most despicable of all is that they have corrupted our beliefs as well! They revere the God-Emperor in the image of a four-armed abomination, their prayers are full of hatred toward those in power, and the promises that their dreadful 'deity' will one day come and equate them with their oppressors... With us, that is. Many fools and troublemakers have fallen for the campaign."

Many fools and troublemakers have fallen for their lies."

Many fools and troublemakers have fallen for their lies."

Their prayers are full of hatred toward those in power and promises of a reckoning when their dreadful 'deity' will come and equate them with their oppressors... With us, that is. Many fools and troublemakers have fallen for their lies."

languages.text: “最可憎的是，他们还扭曲了我们的信仰！他们崇拜的‘神皇’是一只长着四条臂膀的怪物，他们的祈祷中充斥着对当权者的仇恨。他们承诺，他们可怕的‘神明’会降临到这个星球，带来最终的审判，届时，他们便能消灭达戈努斯的压迫者……也就是我们。许多蠢货和骚乱分子都相信了他们的谎言。”
languages.original_text: "And most despicable of all is that they have perverted our faith! They revere the God-Emperor in the form of a four-armed monstrosity. Their prayers are full of hatred toward those in power and promises of a reckoning when their dreadful 'deity' will come and equate them with their oppressors... With us, that is. Many fools and troublemakers have fallen for their lies."

traits.locale_text: “最可憎的是，他们还扭曲了我们的信仰！他们崇拜的‘神皇’是一只长着四条臂膀的怪物，他们的祈祷中充斥着对当权者的仇恨。他们承诺，他们可怕的‘神明’会降临到这个星球，带来最终的审判，届时，他们便能消灭达戈努斯的压迫者……也就是我们。许多蠢货和骚乱分子都相信了他们的谎言。”
“最可憎的是，他们还玷污了我们的信仰！他们崇拜的‘神皇’长着四条臂膀，面目可憎，他们的祈祷中充斥着对当权者的仇恨。他们承诺，他们可怕的‘神明’会降临到这个星球，带来最终的审判，届时，他们便能消灭达戈努斯的压迫者……也就是我们。许多蠢货和骚乱分子都相信了他们的谎言。”

languages.text: «¡Y lo más despreciable de todo es que también han corrompido nuestras creencias! Veneran al Dios Emperador en la imagen de una monstruosidad de cuatro brazos. Sus oraciones están llenas de odio hacia los poderosos y de promesas de justicia cuando su terrible "deidad" descienda para hacerlos iguales a sus opresores... es decir, a nosotros. Muchos necios y alborotadores han caído en sus mentiras».
languages.original_text: "And most despicable of all is that they have perverted our faith! They revere the God-Emperor in the form of a four-armed monstrosity. Their prayers are full of hatred toward those in power and promises of a reckoning when their dreadful 'deity' will come and equate them with their oppressors... With us, that is. Many fools and troublemakers have fallen for their lies."

traits.locale_text: «¡Y lo más despreciable de todo es que también han corrompido nuestras creencias! Veneran al Dios Emperador en la imagen de una monstruosidad de cuatro brazos. Sus oraciones están llenas de odio hacia los poderosos y de promesas de justicia cuando su terrible "deidad" descienda para hacerlos iguales a sus opresores... es decir, a nosotros. Muchos necios y alborotadores han caído en sus mentiras».

languages.text: 「そして何よりも卑劣なのは、奴らが私たちの信仰心をも堕落させていることだ！奴らは4本の腕を持つ忌まわしい姿をした神帝陛下を崇めている。その祈りは、権力を持つ者に対する憎しみと、恐ろしい '神のような存在 'がやってきて自分たちが圧制者と等しくみなされる時の、罰の報いに関する約束ばかりである...私たちもそうだ。愚か者や問題を起こす奴らの多くが奴らの嘘に騙されている」
languages.original_text: "And most despicable of all is that they have perverted our faith! They revere the God-Emperor in the form of a four-armed monstrosity. Their prayers are full of hatred toward those in power and promises of a reckoning when their dreadful 'deity' will come and equate them with their oppressors... With us, that is. Many fools and troublemakers have fallen for their lies."

traits.locale_text: 「そして何よりも卑劣なのは、奴らが私たちの信仰心をも堕落させていることだ！奴らは4本の腕を持つ忌まわしい姿をした神帝陛下を崇めている。その祈りは、権力を持つ者に対する憎しみと、恐ろしい '神のような存在 'がやってきて自分たちが圧制者と等しくみなされる時の、罰の報いに関する約束ばかりである...私たちもそうだ。愚か者や問題を起こす奴らの多くが奴らの嘘に騙されている」
「そして何よりも卑劣なのは、奴らが私たちの信仰心をも堕落させていることだ！奴らは4本の腕を持つ忌まわしい姿をした神帝陛下を崇めている。その祈りは、権力を持つ者に対する憎しみと、恐ろしい '神のような存在 'がやってきて自分たちが圧制者と等しくみなされる時の、罰の報いに関する約束ばかりである...私たちもそうだ。愚か者や問題を起こす奴らの多くが奴らの嘘に騙されている」

languages.text: « Et le pire, c'est qu'ils ont perverti nos propres croyances ! Ils vénèrent une image de l'Empereur-Dieu sous la forme d'un monstre à quatre bras. Leurs prières sont pétries de haine envers nos dirigeants et de promesses d'un jugement lorsque leur terrible "divinité" viendra les libérer de l'oppression... c'est à dire nous. Nombreux sont les imbéciles et les fauteurs de troubles qui ont cru leurs boniments. »
languages.original_text: "And most despicable of all is that they have perverted our faith! They revere the God-Emperor in the form of a four-armed monstrosity. Their prayers are full of hatred toward those in power and promises of a reckoning when their dreadful 'deity' will come and equate them with their oppressors... With us, that is. Many fools and troublemakers have fallen for their lies."

traits.locale_text: « Et le pire, c'est qu'ils ont perverti nos propres croyances ! Ils vénèrent une image de l'Empereur-Dieu sous la forme d'un monstre à quatre bras. Leurs prières sont pétries de haine envers nos dirigeants et de promesses d'un jugement lorsque leur terrible "divinité" viendra les libérer de l'oppression... c'est à dire nous. Nombreux sont les imbéciles et les fauteurs de troubles qui ont cru leurs boniments. »

languages.text: "Und am schlimmsten ist, dass sie auch unseren Glauben pervertiert haben! Sie verehren den Gottimperator in Gestalt einer vierarmigen Monstrosität. Ihre Gebete sind voller Hass auf die Mächtigen und Versprechungen einer Abrechnung. Ihre grauenhafte 'Gottheit' soll kommen und sie auf eine Ebene mit ihren Unterdrückern stellen ... Also mit uns. Viele Narren und Unruhestifter sind schon für ihre Lügen gefallen."
languages.original_text: "And most despicable of all is that they have perverted our faith! They revere the God-Emperor in the form of a four-armed monstrosity. Their prayers are full of hatred toward those in power and promises of a reckoning when their dreadful 'deity' will come and equate them with their oppressors... With us, that is. Many fools and troublemakers have fallen for their lies."

traits.locale_text: "Und am schlimmsten ist, dass sie auch unseren Glauben pervertiert haben! Sie verehren den Gottimperator in Gestalt einer vierarmigen Monstrosität. Ihre Gebete sind voller Hass auf die Mächtigen und Versprechungen einer Abrechnung. Ihre grauenhafte 'Gottheit' soll kommen und sie auf eine Ebene mit ihren Unterdrückern stellen ... Also mit uns. Viele Narren und Unruhestifter sind schon für ihre Lügen gefallen."

"Und das Schändlichste ist, dass sie auch unsere Überzeugungen geschändet haben! Sie verehren den Gottimperator in Form einer vierarmigen Abscheulichkeit. Ihre Gebete sind voller Hass auf die Mächtigen und Versprechungen einer Abrechnung. Ihre grauenhafte 'Gottheit' soll kommen und sie auf eine Ebene mit ihren Unterdrückern stellen ... Also mit uns. Viele Narren und Unruhestifter sind schon für ihre Lügen gefallen."

languages.text: "Tüm bunlar arasında en alçakça olanı ise inancımızı da sapkınlaştırmaları! Tanrı İmparator'a hürmetlerini dört kollu bir canavar formunda gösteriyorlar. Duaları, güç sahibi olanlara nefretle dolu ve tüyler ürpertici 'ilahlarının' gelip onlara zulmedenlerle... Yani bizlerle kendilerini denk tutacağı türden bir hesaplaşma sözü veriyor. Nice ahmak ve baş belası, onların yalanlarına kandı."
languages.original_text: "And most despicable of all is that they have perverted our faith! They revere the God-Emperor in the form of a four-armed monstrosity. Their prayers are full of hatred toward those in power and promises of a reckoning when their dreadful 'deity' will come and equate them with their oppressors... With us, that is. Many fools and troublemakers have fallen for their lies."

Duaları, güç sahibi olanlara nefretle dolu ve tüyler ürpertici 'ilahlarının' gelip onlara zulmedenlerle... Yani bizlerle kendilerini denk tutacağı türden bir hesaplaşma sözü veriyor. Nice ahmak ve baş belası, onların yalanlarına kandı."
